item.title: Soo... The border we planned to cross closed two minutes before we got there, and the WalMart stopped being 24hrs two weeks ago... We stayed at the Holiday Inn. It was a good decision. Now we'll finish our breakfast, pick up food and then head down to the campground. With @tservice91 and @quistja #wewantedanadventure #fiveminuteslate #daylightsavingsproblems
item.description:

item.title: 1st stop on our long weekend adventure. Next up, U.S. Border crossing. With @tservice91 and @quistja #yesimcanadian #timhortons
item.description: 1st stop on our long weekend adventure. Next up, U.S. Border crossing. With @tservice91 and @quistja #yesimcanadian #timhortons

item.title: ROAD TRIP! September 2015
item.description:
ROAD TRIP! September 2015

Adventures, by their very definition, are unpredictable. At least, thatâ€™s how they are in my head. And often, despite my very best intentions, something that should have been very simple turns into an adventure on the way.
